channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Hero Dubai Desert Classic 2026 live stream: how to watch DP World Tour golf online, TV channels, preview, Round 1 tee times
item.description: All the ways to watch Hero Dubai Desert Classic 2026 live streams online from anywhere, as Rory McIlroy, Tommy Fleetwood & Co. start the new golf season.

item.title: Microsoft CEO urges AI developers “to get to a point where we are using this to do something useful,” or “lose even the social permission...to generate these tokens”
item.description: Satya Nadella used his Davos platform to warn that AI’s future hinges on proving real-world utility.

item.title: “I think it's a bit like selling nuclear weapons to North Korea and bragging” — Anthropic's CEO warns Davos about letting Nvidia sell AI chips to China
item.description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei riled Davos attendees by condemning U.S.-approved Nvidia chip sales to China
